DOC.brief_summary: To assess safety effectiveness one dose new pain reliever medicine ( JNJ-10450232 either 250 1000 mg strength ) compare placebo ( sugar pill ) acetaminophen 1000 mg surgical removal third molar . The primary endpoint evaluate pain relief effectiveness 6 hour administration study drug .
DOC.brief_title: A Dental Pain Study Test Effectiveness New Pain Reliever Medicine
DOC.detailed_description: This single-center , randomize , double-blind , placebo- active-controlled , parallel group study evaluate efficacy , safety pharmacokinetic profile JNJ-10450232 , administer single dose capsule ( 250 1000 mg ) , 24 hour period molar extraction . Subjects stay research center ~24 hour administration study drug . Healthy male subject , age 18 45 year inclusive , screen medical history , vital sign , electrocardiogram ( ECG ) , clinical laboratory test . Eligible subject return clinic day surgery complete baseline vital sign clinical laboratory test . They undergo dental extraction minimum three third-molars , qualify , randomly assign one four study treatment pain .
DOC.criteria: Subjects age 1845 year At least moderate dental pain assess categorical scale pain intensity scale score least 5 11point ( 010 ) pain intensity numerical rating scale ( PINRS ) follow surgical removal three thirdmolars Subjects otherwise healthy Test positive urine drug screen Taking prohibit medication allow participate study
